mapper.select: select b.id, b.type, b.title, b.img, b.views, b.created_at, b.modified_at, b.user_id, u.user_id as user_user_id, u.nickname from board b, user u where b.user_id = u.id order by modified_at limit #{offset} , #{pageSize}
select b.id, b.type, b.title, b.content, b.img, b.views, b.created_at, b.modified_at, b.user_id, u.user_id as user_user_id, u.nickname from board b, user u where b.id=#{id} and b.user_id = u.id
mapper.insert: insert into board (type, title, img, content, views, created_at, modified_at, user_id) values (#{type}, #{title}, #{img}, #{content}, 0, now(), now(), #{user_id})
mapper.select: select img from board where id=#{id}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM BOARD
mapper.update: update board set views=views+1 where id=#{id}
